description: Non material amendment under Section 96A of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 for the addition of a new condition and variation of the wording of conditions 8, 20, 32, 33, 34, 42 & 43 of planning permission 06/00442/FULEIA approved on 20th December 2007 for the demolition and redevelopment to provide four separate buildings arranged on 2 basement floors, ground, and up to 21 upper floors comprising floorspace for use within Classes B1 (offices) and A (retail) of the Use Class Order, the reconstruction of the Remains of the Temple of Mithras & display chamber, the opportunity to provide a new entrance to Bank Station, the creation of new public realm, associated pavilion and pedestrian routes, the provision of ancillary services and other incidental works.
site_name: Land Bounded By Cannon Street, Queen Street, Queen Victoria Street, Bucklersbury House & WalbrookLondonEC4
